page.title: 19A GIRL IN WHITKIRK
page.content: On{Tuesday}like most days I get up at half past seven and go downstairs for breakfast. After breakfast I go upstairs to get washed and dressed.{On {the way to school}I usually call for a friend and we talk about various things. Usually on a Tuesday our first lesson is handwriting and then we have science and humanities. Dinner time; thank goodness I think to myself!{In the afternoon}we have English and Maths.{At home time}I find Keely again and we walk home together. {At home}I have my tea straight away, normally sandwiches and some orange juice. If time I play out, especially in the summer, with my sister Jill and other children. Jill goes to{brownies on a Tuesday and I watch television until I go to{bed,}which is usually about nine o'clock. I am ten years old.
